ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal

STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 telesetup.py locally or https://telebot-sessionstring-generator.xditya.repl.run online.

CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.description: The message that appears when someone PM's you. Leave it as such for default message.
CUSTOM_PMPERMIT.value: Do not spam here, else you will be blocked automatically.

CMD_HNDLR.description: A handler key which you will be using to control the bot. Default is .(dot)

SUDO_HNDLR.description: Used to invoke sudo commands, leave blank for default

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API. Required for updating your bot in future.

SUDO_USERS.description: Users whom you want to give full access to your bot. (Don't allow unknown people)

TUFAANBOT_LOGGER.description: A group/channel where you want to keep your logs of the bot. Leave this as it is.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TG_BOTFATHER_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the token of your bot.

TG_BOTFATHER_USERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the username of your bot. Needed for .help to work.

MAX_SPAM.description: Number of messages one can send in your PM before being approved. By default, it is 3.

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time on autopic/get time. Know your timezone from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
